channel.title: Combat Arms
channel.description:
free FPS, they're doing an event where you recruit friends. for so many you get x amount of GP, cases, exp/gp passes, black keys, and so on. im already gettign sick of making emails. so if you wanna help out, go for it!
download the game, make an account. when you get ingame you will see this box that asks for your recruiter's name. put in SnakeDoc-STS
*copy and pasted from the FAS fourms

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: RebornShadow
item.description:
The EU version of CA is even worse than the US version.

In the EU version you get to see a lot of cheating cunts and a lot of players use these nx weapons shit. It’s no fun at all playing this game. I played the US version after EU version sucked for me and the US version is way better. Cuz in the EU version you get votekicked for a multi kill headshot only… or if you do an unbelieveable.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Yup. Or someone who uses the prepaid cards to buy awesome guns above his standard level. Like meeee.

I play it on occasion, it’s actually quite fun when people aren’t cheating, mic spamming, or votekicking you. Which is rare.

Read full topic

item.description:
I played this game for about two weeks and got bored. I really do care about Grahics and really in the game that you do not need very end. I would play Reath Soldier Front.

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
I played CA back in High school… when the club I was in wanted a multi-player game that they could all join in on… I played for maybe a weekend and then got fed up with the spawnkilling assholes and overabundance of Bottomless pits and cheaters.

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: Combine
item.description:
The weapon rental system killed it for me. When I pay for something, I expect to keep it.

Plus any game that gives you such and such for spamming your friends’ emails is inherently bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: Bobikan00sh
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

What is Combat Arms besides Counter-Strike with worse graphics and gameplay?

well if i remember correctly, there’s a special mode when the entire development team sticks there collective giant gnarled penis of banning authority through your monitor and tells you to suck it or else they will throw you out. unsurprisingly that is considered the best mode in the game by its majority of 12-14 year old players

Edit: that’s only one difference though. i’m sure there are more

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: Khaos124
item.description:
This game is the one i play when i rage on css and go play with my friend whos laptop is to shitty to play tetris, and everyone on it is a poor person who has no idea what FPS even means… and plus they all hack. The only thing close to a positive about that game is the clan play. Thts it. Oh BTW, anybody who is halfway decent at css cant even play it because u get rage kicked every five seconds. i dont think ive finished a match on that in like 2 weeks. shitty game is shitty.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Arms
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

What is Combat Arms besides Counter-Strike with worse graphics and gameplay?

It’s Counter-Strike with worse graphics, gameplay, and they have the typical Nexon Store gimmick where you pay money for ingame items that make you better.
